description: The device generates this notification when the map-resolver
reachability state changes. The lispUseMapResolverAddressLength
and lispUseMapResolverAddress values are attached to the notification
object ID.
State of this Map-Resolver configured on this device
(1 = Map-Resolver is up; 2 = Map-Resolver is down).
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispUseMapResolverState

description: The device generates this notification when the reliable transport
session state changes. The clispReliableTransportSessionPeerAddressLength
clispReliableTransportSessionPeerAddress
clispReliableTransportSessionPeerPort
clispReliableTransportSessionLocalAddressLength,
clispReliableTransportSessionLocalAddress
clispReliableTransportSessionLocalPort values are attached to the
notification object ID.
This object indicates the state of the reliable transport session.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtReliableTransportSessionState

description: The device generates this notification when the xTR fails to
register a database mapping with the map-server.
The lispMappingDatabaseEidLength, lispMappingDatabaseEid
lispUseMapServerAddressLength, lispUseMapServerAddress values
are attached to the notification object ID.

event.Summary: XTR failed to register database mapping with map-server. Server state: $v2

description: The value of sysUpTime at which the EID Prefix information
represented by this mapping database entry was configured
on this device.
If this information was present at the most recent
reinitialization of the local management subsystem, then
this object contains a zero value.
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispMappingDatabaseTimeStamp

description: State of this Map-Server configured on this device
(1 = Map-Server is up; 2 = Map-Server is down).
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispUseMapServerState

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server
reachability state changes. The lispUseMapServerAddressLength
and lispUseMapServerAddress values are attached to the notification
object ID.
State of this Map-Server configured on this device
(1 = Map-Server is up; 2 = Map-Server is down).
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispUseMapServerState

description: The device generates this notification when the proxy ETR
reachability state changes. The lispUseProxyEtrAddressLength and
lispUseProxyEtrAddress values are attached to the notification
object ID.
State of this Proxy ETR configured on this device
(0 = Proxy ETR is down; 1 = Proxy ETR is up).
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispUseProxyEtrState

description: The device generates this notification when all the registration
for a site expires on the map-server. The lispEidRegistrationEidLength
and lispEidRegistrationEid values are attached to the notification
object ID.

event.Summary: All registrations for $v1 expired on the map-server

description: Site name used by a Map-Server to distinguish different
LISP sites that are registering with it.
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispEidRegistrationSiteName

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server fails
to accept a map registration. The lispEidRegistrationEidLength
and lispEidRegistrationEid values are attached to the notification
object ID.
If clispExtEidRegFailureCause value is noEidPrefixConfiguration(1) the
lispEidRegistrationSiteName object in the notification will be empty.

event.Summary: Map-server failed to accept map registration due to $v2

description: Site name used by a Map-Server to distinguish different
LISP sites that are registering with it.
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispEidRegistrationSiteName

description: This object indicates the cause of the map registration failure
on the map-server.
'noEidPrefixConfiguration'
No site configuration to accept registration for
EID prefix.
'authenticationFailure'
Failed to authenticate map-register for EID prefix.
'allowedLocatorMismatch'
map-register contains RLOC that is not in the site's
allowed locator list.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtEidRegFailureCause

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server has
reached the limit of the number of map registrations it can accept
as a result of the accept-more-specific configuration. This
notification is instance specific. The lispFeaturesInstanceID and
lispFeaturesAddressFamily values are attached to the notification
object ID.
This object indicates the accept-more-specific registration limit
on the map-server.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtFeaturesEidRegMoreSpecificLimit

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server has
reached the threshold of the number of map registrations it can
accept as a result of accept-more-specific configuration. This
notification is instance specific. The lispFeaturesInstanceID and
lispFeaturesAddressFamily values are attached to the notification
object ID.
This object indicates the warning threshold for the
accept-more-specific registration count on the map-server.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtFeaturesEidRegMoreSpecificWarningThreshold

description: The device generates this notification when the map-resolver
drops a map-request because the map-request does not conform to
configured policy. The lispEidRegistrationEidLength and
lispEidRegistrationEid values are attached to the notification
object ID.

event.Summary: Map-resolver dropped the map-request due to $v2

description: Site name used by a Map-Server to distinguish different
LISP sites that are registering with it.
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispEidRegistrationSiteName

description: This object indicates the cause of the map-request drop on the
map-resolver.
'malformedRequest'
map-request is not valid.
'noMatchingEidRegistration'
could not find matching EID registration for
the map-request.
'allowedLocatorPolicyViolation'
map request does not conform to the configured
allowed-locator policy.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtEidRegMapRequestDroppedCause

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server has
reached the limit of the number of map registrations it can accept
as a result of the accept-more-specific configuration. This
notification is router LISP instance specific.
This object indicates the accept-more-specific registration limit
on the map-server. This is applicable to all EID instances.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtEidRegMoreSpecificLimit

description: The device generates this notification when the map-server has
reached the threshold of the number of map registrations it can
accept as a result of accept-more-specific configuration. This
notification is router LISP instance specific.
This object indicates the warning threshold for the
accept-more-specific registration count on the map-server.
This warning threshold is applicable to all EID instances.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtEidRegMoreSpecificWarningThreshold

description: The device generates this notification when the xTR has reached
the limit of the number of map-cache it can create. This
notification is instance specific. The lispFeaturesInstanceID and
lispFeaturesAddressFamily values are attached to the notification
object ID.
Maximum permissible entries in EID-to-RLOC map-cache on
this device.
variables.name: LISP-MIB::lispFeaturesMapCacheLimit

description: The device generates this notification when the xTR has reached
the threshold of the number of map-cache it can create. This
notification is instance specific. The lispFeaturesInstanceID and
lispFeaturesAddressFamily values are attached to the notification
object ID.
This object indicates the map-cache warning threshold on the xTR.
variables.name: CISCO-LISP-EXT-MIB::clispExtFeaturesMapCacheWarningThreshold
